caption.p: Construction of the recombinant plasmid pcDNA3.1/P12A3C. PCR ( A), enzyme digestion ( B).

Notes: M1 and M2 indicates DNA ladder markers; Lane 1 indicates the PCR product of P12A; lane 2 indicates the PCR product of 3C; lane 3 indicates EcoR I- and Xbal I-digested pcDNA3.1/P12A3C; lane 4 indicates BamH I- and Xbal I-digested; lane 5 indicates BamH I- and EcoR I-digested.
